verbs.description: [ARG1: suicidal teens] [V: turn] [ARGM-DIR: to tylenol] a local mother was having fun at a family picnic but could n't stop thinking about her 17-year - old son who chose to stay home at the hospital eight to 10 hours after her son swallowed all those pills she learned it was acetaminophen centers for disease control and prevention hepatotoxicity albany memorial abdominal pain acetylcysteine vomiting naproxen ibuprofen dr heather long painkillers
